JUAN
Admiral, the three compasses are
pointing north-west!
COLUMBUS
- What phenomenon is this? What draws
them to the west?
(the din outside increases
alarmingly)
Be calm! To your stations! Keep to
the course, and stay calm!
(the uproar gradually dies
down)
JUAN
The compass has returned to normal.
Quiet is restored. • . but, Admiral,
the men are discouraged!
COLUMBUS
Watch over them, Juan. . • we must keep
hope alive. • .
JUAN
- Such an incident as this could be very
dangerous. . . do you think it could
happen again?
COLUMBUS
I know not... I must think about this
extraordinary occurrence... first of all
I must explain it to myself...Go, Juan
do not abandon the crew.
GARCIA
Cristobal Colon, do you know why the
compass deviated?
COLUMBUS
It deviated, yes... why?
GARCIA
A submerged continent.
COLUMBUS
Possibly.
